title: Lamb of God Accepts Award from Pastor Joel Osteen, Who Didn’t Know They’re Not a Christian Band
subtitle: A fake news article reported that the heavy metal band Lamb of God was given an “excellence in faith outreach” award by televangelist pastor Joel Osteen.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The band Lamb of God was given an award for "excellence in faith outreach" by televangelist pastor Joel Osteen.
